macro.name: RAMP_FILE_NAME
macro.description: File name to use for ramp (defaults to Default.txt).

macro.name: USE_RAMP_FILE
macro.description: Whether to use (1) or not use (0) the ramp file specified above (defaults to 0).

macro.name: POLL_RATE
macro.description: The poll rate of non-channel values.

macro.name: CHANNEL_POLL_RATE
macro.description: The poll rate of channel values.
